posts.post_content:
I'm looking for some Jimmy Lavenders.
I have Pied and Polar Bear.
Anyone have others available?

A crease or two is fine, but no paper loss, front or back.

Thanks.

Bump.
I now have Pied, PB and Sweet Corp.
Anyone have any others?
I actually don't know what backs he appeared on.
Thanks.

I don't have a card for you, but if you are wondering what backs are possible for Lavender I would go the the T206 Resource and go through the print list for each back starting with AB: 

[url]http://t206resource.com/American%20Beauty%20350%20Frame%20Checklist.html[/url]

Thank you Bryan. That helps.  I'll now have a list to work with.

[quote name="Jobu" post=1364597]I don't have a card for you, but if you are wondering what backs are possible for Lavender I would go the the T206 Resource and go through the print list for each back starting with AB: 

[url]http://t206resource.com/American%20Beauty%20350%20Frame%20Checklist.html[/url][/QUOTE]

[quote name="Jobu" post=1364597]I don't have a card for you, but if you are wondering what backs are possible for Lavender I would go the the T206 Resource and go through the print list for each back starting with AB: 

[url]http://t206resource.com/American%20Beauty%20350%20Frame%20Checklist.html[/url][/QUOTE]

Or go to T206Resource.com, click on Checklists, then click on Searchable Database, Enter in his Last Name, then click Search.


ChiSoxFan

[quote name="ChiSoxFan" post=1365925]Or go to T206Resource.com, click on Checklists, then click on Searchable Database, Enter in his Last Name, then click Search.


ChiSoxFan[/QUOTE]

Most excellent. No scrolling here. Thank you.

Picked up a Sovereign 'Lime" I think. It is green ...I know that.
Still looking for other backs. Let me know if you have one you could part with.

Condition not an issue. Just no paper loss.

-Jimmy
fyi there are two American Beauty Jimmy Lavender's on ebay right now.

[quote name="The Nasty Nati" post=1373166]fyi there are two American Beauty Jimmy Lavender's on ebay right now.[/QUOTE]

Headed there now. Thanks for the heads up.
